scripts.build:image: npm run build && docker buildx build --tag pepr:dev .
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:journey
scripts.test:journey: npm run test:journey:k3d && npm run test:journey:build && npm run test:journey:image && npm run test:journey:run
scripts.test:journey-wasm: npm run test:journey:k3d && npm run test:journey:build && npm run test:journey:image && npm run test:journey:run-wasm
scripts.test:journey:image: docker buildx build --tag pepr:dev . && k3d image import pepr:dev -c pepr-dev
scripts.test:journey:k3d: k3d cluster delete pepr-dev && k3d cluster create pepr-dev --k3s-arg '--debug@server:0' --wait && kubectl rollout status deployment -n kube-system
scripts.test:journey:test: jest --detectOpenHandles journey/entrypoint.test.ts # Useful for just running whatevers uncommented
scripts.test:journey:run: jest --detectOpenHandles journey/entrypoint.test.ts && npm run test:journey:prep && npm run test:journey:upgrade
scripts.test:journey:upgrade: npm run test:journey:k3d && npm run test:journey:image && jest --detectOpenHandles journey/pepr-upgrade.test.ts
